alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 04 at 9:55PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Heavy snow will impact portions of northeastern Essex, northwestern Addison and southwestern Chittenden Counties through MIDNIGHT EST... At 952 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was reported south of Lake Champlain, extending from Shelburne to Weybridge. This area of heavy snow nearly stationary. HAZARD...Snow accumulation 1 to 2 inches per hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated, though trained weather spotters in Charlotte reported 1.5 inches of accumulation in 45 minutes from this band earlier in the evening. IMPACT...Rapidly accumulating snow will make travel difficult. Locations impacted include... Vergennes, South Burlington, Burlington, Ferrisburg, Charlotte, Waltham, New Haven, Shelburne, Ferrisburgh, Mt. Philo State Park, Weybridge, Monkton, Panton, Addison, Mcneil Cove, Shelburne Falls, Wings Point, Thompsons Point, Town Farm Bay and Meach Island.
info.instruction: Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
